#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const int N = (int)(1e4 + 5);

double V[N], t[N], A, D;
int n;

int main ()
{
	int T;
	cin >> T;
	while (T--)
	{
		cin >> n >> A >> D;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			cin >> t[i] >> V[i];
			double d = (V[i] * V[i]) / (2.0 * A);
			if (d <= D)
				t[i] += V[i] / A + (D - d) / V[i];
			else
				t[i] += sqrt (2.0 * D / A);
		}
		printf ("%.6lf\n", t[0]);
		for (int i = 1; i < n; i++)
		{
			t[i] = max (t[i - 1], t[i]);
			printf ("%.6lf\n", t[i]);
		}
	}
}
